note.p: Education: Dr Uvedale's School, Enfield, Middlesex; Trinity College, Cambridge; LLB (1726), LLD (Com. Reg. 1728)

Career: Ordained deacon and priest (1727); Vicar of Hather and Keelby, Lincolnshire (1727); Dean of Peterborough (1744-1764); Rector of Peakirk with Glinton, Northamptonshire (1747-1763); Prebendary of Lincoln (1750); Rector of Hatfield, Hertfordshire (1763-1769); Bishop of Peterborough (1764-1769)
